com.communote.server.api.core.config.type

Enum ClientProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ClientProperty>
      • com.communote.server.api.core.config.type.ClientProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant, ConfigurationPropertyConstant, Serializable, Comparable<ClientProperty>

    public enum ClientProperty
extends Enum<ClientProperty>
implements ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant
    Property constants for general client settings.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      static class  ClientProperty.REPOSITORY_MODE
      The repository mode determines how the correct external repository is identified by the user service if a new users arrives.

      Property to store the date of the 90 percent notify mail for the user tagged item limit
      CLIENT_USER_TAGGED_COUNT_LIMIT
      Property for the resource count limit
      COMPARE_EXTERNAL_GROUP_IDS_LOWERCASE
      If this property is set, the ids of external groups will be considered as always lower case.
      COMPARE_EXTERNAL_USER_ALIAS_LOWERCASE
      If this property is set (default), the internal alias and the external user alias will be compared ignoring case.
      COMPARE_EXTERNAL_USER_IDS_LOWERCASE
      If this property is set, the ids of external users will be considered as always lower case.
      CREATE_EXTERNAL_GROUP_AUTOMATICALLY
      Property to decide that an unknown external group should create
      CREATE_EXTERNAL_USER_AUTOMATICALLY
      Property to decide that an unknown external user should create
      CREATE_PERSONAL_BLOG
      Property for setting the creation of personal blog
      CREATION_DATE
      Creation Date
      DEFAULT_LANGUAGE
      Default language
      DELETE_USER_BY_ANONYMIZE_ENABLED
      Property defining whether a user can be deleted by making him anonymous and removing all his data (UTIs? What's this?).
      DELETE_USER_BY_DISABLE_ENABLED
      Property defining whether a user can be deleted by disabling him, but keeping all his data (UTIs? What's this?).
      FILE_SYSTEM_REPOSITORY_SIZE_100_MAIL
      Property to show, the email for reaching 100% of the repository size limit was already sent today.
      FILE_SYSTEM_REPOSITORY_SIZE_90_MAIL
      Property to show, the email for reaching 90% of the repository size limit was already sent.
      FILE_SYSTEM_REPOSITORY_SIZE_LIMIT
      Property for the limit of the content repository size.
      GENERIC_AUTHENTICATOR_ENABLED
      Property for the enabling the generic authenticator.
      GENERIC_AUTHENTICATOR_TOKEN_NAME
      Property for the token for the generic authenticator.
      GENERIC_AUTHENTICATOR_URL_TOKEN_NAME
      Property for the token for the generic authenticator coming for the request.
      GROUP_SYNCHRONIZATION_DO_FULL_SYNC
      Property for setting that the synchronization should do a full sync.
      GROUP_SYNCHRONIZATION_INTERVAL_IN_MINUTES
      Property for setting the interval for group synchronizations.
      INVITATION_RENDER_BLOG_PERMALINK
      Denotes whether a link to the blog will be added to the blog invitation email.
      MAX_NUMBER_OF_MENTIONED_USERS
      Defines the maximal amount of users, which can be notified using the @@ syntax.
      NO_REGISTRATION_USER_NOTIFY_EMAILS_WHEN_EXTERNAL_AUTH
      Property defining whether notification emails (user was activated, activation reminder) should not be sent to the user when an external authentication is defined and activated.
      NOTES_TO_USE_FOR_TRENDS
      The number of notes to respect for trends
      NOTES_TO_USE_FOR_TRENDS_IN_FOLLOWING
      This is used to set a specific value for the following view.
      NOTIFICATION_RENDER_ATTACHMENTLINKS
      Denotes whether the links to attachments should be rendered.
      NOTIFICATION_RENDER_PERMALINKS
      Denotes whether permalinks to communote should be rendered.
      NUMBER_OF_DAYS_FOR_MOST_USED_BLOGS
      The number of days, which count for the most used blogs.
      PRESELECTED_TAB
      The preselected tab.
      PRESELECTED_TOPIC_OVERVIEW_TAB
      The preselected topic overview tab.
      PRESELECTED_VIEW
      The preselected view.
      REMIND_USER_TIME
      time in milliseconds after the user will be reminded to login or to confirm its email adress.
      REPLY_TO_ADDRESS
      Property of the reply to address.
      REPLY_TO_ADDRESS_NAME
      Property of the reply to address personal name.
      SUPPORT_EMAIL_ADDRESS
      Property of the support email address
      TERMS_OF_USE_USERS_MUST_ACCEPT
      Property defining whether users have to accept the terms of use
      TOP_LEVEL_TOPICS_ENABLED
      Property for Top Level Topics.
      UNIQUE_CLIENT_IDENTIFER
      The unique id of this client.
      USER_MANAGEMENT_USER_LIMIT
      Property for the limit of active user accounts of the client
      USER_MANAGEMENT_USER_LIMIT_100_MAIL_SENT
      Property holding a boolean flag that denotes whether the email for reaching 100% of the active user count limit has already been sent
      USER_MANAGEMENT_USER_LIMIT_90_MAIL_SENT
      Property holding a boolean flag that denotes whether the email for reaching 90% of the active user count limit has already been sent
      USER_MANAGEMENT_USER_LIMIT_ACTIVATION_CHANGED
      Property denoting whether the value of AUTOMATIC_USER_ACTIVATION has been changed automatically after reaching the user count limit.
      USER_REGISTRATION_ALLOWED
      Property for the enabling the generic authenticator.
      USER_SERVICE_REPOSITORY_MODE
      Mode of the service on determinig the user repositories
      USER_SERVICE_REPOSITORY_PRIMARY
      External system identifier of the primary repository

      • values

        public static ClientProperty[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (ClientProperty c : ClientProperty.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the enum constant to be returned.
        Returns:
        the enum constant with the specified name
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this enum type has no constant with the specified name

        public boolean getValue(boolean defaultValue)

        Returns:
